category.name: Project Level Security
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_multi_site_project_member_bypass
preference.preference_description: Determines the assignment rule to a defined project for objects replicated during an import operation to a remote site. Valid values are: * true: The replicated object is assigned to the defined project regardless of whether the importing user is a project member. This is the default value. * false: The replicated object is assigned to the defined project if the importing user is a privileged project member. If the importing user is a regular project member then TC_project_validate_condition preference determines the project assignment on replicated object.
